channel.title: Inside Scoop Live
channel.description: Inside Scoop Live is a global internet-based broadcast specializing in interviewing published authors about their current books and areas of expertise. Join us and hear both well-known and up-coming writers talking candidly about their life experience as well as the business of being an author in today’s literary world. Always interesting and current, we strive to bring our audience high quality discussions that spotlight a vast diversity of authors in the field today.
channel.itunes:author: Inside Scoop Live
channel.itunes:summary: We are the leader in providing a vehicle for authors to talk to their reading audience. Join in and listen to fascinating discussions with writers about current and social issues, finances, self-improvement, romance, mortality and much more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fascinating discussions with authors.

item.title: Hollywood and Catholic Women, 2nd Edition
item.description:
* Inspiration for writing about Catholic Women's portrayal in Hollywood,
* Catholic Women and Feminism,
* Society's and Religious Institutions' demeaning portrayal of women in current times,
* Schleich's goal for her book,
* Schleich's own experience with Catholicism.
